poster: s h i m j i
title: You have earned a key fragment!
body:
Hello,

I am thoroughly impressed with what Riot has done with the new client. The animations and UI are all so smooth and convenient. There is an issue that is persisting, however, every time I log in. The client lets me know, animations and all, that **"You have earned a key fragment!"**, but when I go and check my loot, there is no change. This must have happened about 4 times now. I just need to know if this is a bug, or am I missing out on some key fragments.

-Shimkun

replies.body: Me too. I have submitted a bug report.
